website_summaries.verdict: A natural-finish bamboo bed tray with folding legs that's highly functional and simple to operate.
pros: Nut can be tightened if legs become loose
Folding legs tuck away nicely, which makes it easy to store when not in use
cons: It's not recommended to get this tray very wet, as it could split
Use a lightly damp cloth when cleaning
